sentences.sContent: As well as binding cortisol, it could respond to other hormones such as aldosterone and deoxycorticosterone.
sentences.sContent_eng: As well as binding cortisol, it could respond to other hormones such as aldosterone and deoxycorticosterone.
sentences.sCn: 在结合应激激素的同时，它还能够对其他激素产生响应，例如醛固酮和去氧皮质酮。

sentences.sContent: In Addison's disease, your adrenal glands produce too little cortisol and often insufficient levels of aldosterone as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Addison's disease, your adrenal glands produce too little cortisol and often insufficient levels of aldosterone as well.
sentences.sCn: 阿狄森氏病患者的肾上腺只合成皮质醇过少，醛固酮（同为肾上腺产生）的水平往往也不足。

sentences.sContent: The dietary change was also shown to cause the kidneys to release more of a protein called renin and its hormone aldosterone which is linked with high blood pressure.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dietary change was also shown to cause the kidneys to release more of a protein called renin and its hormone aldosterone which is linked with high blood pressure.
sentences.sCn: 饮食的改变也使肾脏分泌出更多的肾激素，肾激素是一种蛋白质，它的激素醛固酮与高血压密切相关。

trans.tranOther: the principal mineralocorticoid secreted by the adrenal cortex. A synthesized form is used in the treatment of Addison's disease. Formula: C21H27O5
